- No, we can't. We don't know.

1672.68.text: Who recorded match figures of...? GONG

1674.96.text: And at the gong, Bristol University have 70,

1681.72.text: Well, it wasn't a particularly high scoring game, I have to say!

1686.16.text: And you seemed to have some difficulty with the rules,

1690.52.text: And you spent an awful lot of time conferring, Nottingham.

1692.88.text: Anyway, it was good fun. Thank you very much for joining us.

1695.44.text: We shall have to say goodbye to both of you, I fear.

1697.96.text: Thank you very much for playing. You didn't have to. Thank you.

1701.84.text: I hope you can join us next time because we now know the teams

1705.40.text: in the semifinal stage of the competition.

1707.40.text: They will be the University of Kent, St Anne's College, Oxford,

1710.84.text: St Hilda's College, Oxford, and Leeds University.

1713.96.text: I hope you can join me for the first of the semifinals next time.

1717.28.text:
- Until then, though, it's goodbye from Bristol University. ALL: 
- Bye.

1721.28.text:
- It's goodbye from Nottingham University. ALL: 
- Goodbye.

1724.08.text: And it's goodbye from me. Goodbye.
